A

AbstractCreateMode - Class in sokobangame.controller.modes
Uses the template pattern to allow for minimal implementations of the various create modes (with attemptObjectCreation as a template method).
AbstractCreateMode(ModeManager) - Constructor for class sokobangame.controller.modes.AbstractCreateMode
 
AbstractHighlighterMode - Class in sokobangame.controller.modes
A Mode sub-classing this will draw a tile highlighter when the user moves their mouse around the maze view.

addMazeListener(MazeListener) - Method in interface sokobangame.model.Maze
Adds a listener to maze events (when a tile's contents change, and when the game has been won).

addObject(MazeObject, int, int, boolean) - Method in interface sokobangame.model.Maze
Adds an object at the given x/y, if the placement is allowed (or if ignoreConstraints is true).
adjustTileSize() - Method in class sokobangame.view.MazeView
Adjusts the tile-size based on the size of the panel (which depends on the size of the application frame, and whether the tool-bar is present in the frame).
ApplicationFrame - Class in sokobangame

A frame that glues the game's components together into a coherent application.
ArrayMaze - Class in sokobangame.model
An implementation of the Maze interface that uses a 3-dimensional array of LinkedLists to store the Maze's objects.
